data.text: Johansen, Iris. Eve Duncan forensics thriller.

link.func: search=SERW~!Johansen, Iris. Eve Duncan forensics thriller.

data.text: Forensic sculptor Eve Duncan zeros in on the kidnapper and serial killer who years earlier abducted and murdered her seven-year-old daughter, Bonnie.
